page.title: 16Arbroath,credits.
page.content: All of the children in Mrs.Scothern's class,14 altogether, did this block . They are Wendy Jarrett,Jayne Spurway, Marcia Prow,Tracey Maddin,Scott Donald,Michael Patterson,Brian Cooper, Desmond Cotton,- that's Primary 7- and Nicholas Strachan,Lyn Patterson,Karen Muirhead, Primary 6, and Angela Prow, Jennifer Donald,Allana Jarret,Primary 5. Other people who deserve a mention are, Mr.Sutherland,the librarian, Mr. McCluskey,the custodian of the Abbey, Mrs. Mary Mitchell,ex-school cleaner, Mr.Stirling,the farmer,Mr,Muirhead and Mr. Wood,the farm workers,Mr.Johnstone the Rector of Arbroath Academy,various people in the Health Centre,Mrs.Wight, who let us use her camera, and to the the members of the public who were so kind and obliging.
